src_original: pratiṣṭhāpya sa yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - yo hi bhagavaṃ
tgt_original: 於佛世尊合掌禮敬。 而白佛言世尊。

src_original: mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena krodharājā yamāntako nāma bhāṣitaḥ tasya kalpaṃ vistaraśo  bhagavatā na prakāśitam /  nāpi mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena /
tgt_original: 曼殊室利童真不廣說閻曼德迦忿怒王。

src_original: ahaṃ bhagavaṃ paścimatā janatāmavekṣya bhagavatā parinirvṛte śāsanāntardhānakālasamaye
tgt_original: 我觀未來有情。 如來涅槃後佛教隱滅。

src_original: vartamāne mahābhairavakāle yugādhame sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhavinirmukte buddhakṣetre
tgt_original: 大恐怖末法之時。 無聲聞緣覺遠離佛剎。

src_original: tathāgataśāsanasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ dharmadhātucirasthityarthaṃ sarvaduṣṭarājñāṃ nivāraṇārthaṃ
tgt_original: 護持正法故法界久住故。 制伏一切難調悖逆偽王故。

src_original: ratnatrayāpakāriṇāṃ nigrahārthaṃ vaineyasattvakauśalācintyabodhisattvacaryāparipūraṇārthaṃ
tgt_original: 不利益三寶者。 菩薩善巧以此不思議法。 治罰調伏滿足故。

src_original: acintyasattvapākamabhinirharaṇārthaṃ ca paścime bhagavaṃ kāle paścime sugatasamaye
tgt_original: 以不思議法成熟離惡趣故。

src_original: śāsanavipralope vartamāne ya imaṃ yamāntakaṃ nāma krodharājānaṃ yathāvidhi kalpavinirdiṣṭaṃ  prayokṣyati tasya siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati /
tgt_original: 於佛法磨滅時。 令住持佛法者依法教。 持誦閻曼德迦忿怒王皆悉決定成就。

src_original: niyataṃ ca duṣṭarājñāṃ śāsanāpakāriṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ mahāyakṣāṇāṃ mahotsāhināṃ nigrahānugrahapravṛttānāṃ mahākaruṇāvirahitānāṃ teṣāmayaṃ krodharājā prayoktavyaḥ nānyeṣām //
tgt_original: 不益於佛教有情及悖逆偽王。 於佛教不益者有情。 應用閻曼德迦忿怒王非餘類者。

src_original: atha bhagavāṃ tūṣṇīmbhāvena buddhavikurvaṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma /
tgt_original: 爾時世尊默然入遊戲神通加持三昧。

src_original: mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto 'pi tūṣṇīmbhāvena sthito 'bhūt /
tgt_original: 曼殊室利菩薩亦寂默而住。

src_original: sarvāvantaśca parṣanmaṇḍala ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampamajāyata /
tgt_original: 一切集會眾六種震動。

src_original: bhītāśca devasaṅghā uktrastāḥ sarvabāleśāḥ /
tgt_original: 天眾皆悉驚忙惶怖。

src_original: sarvadevāśca nāgāśca dānavendrāḥ samātarāḥ // Mmk_50.1 //  sarve ca grahamukhyādyā devasaṅghāḥ prakampire /
tgt_original: 一切天龍阿修羅王。 及諸母天一切曜等并天人眾。

src_original: mānuṣā prakampe bhinnamanaso duṣṭacittāśca pūtanāḥ // Mmk_50.2 //  ārttā bhītāḥ tataste vai raudracittā narādhipāḥ /
tgt_original: 彼等震動心生苦惱。 惡心布單那暴惡者。

src_original: śaraṇaṃ te tadā jagmuḥ dharmarājasya śāsanam // Mmk_50.3 //  guhyakendrasya yakṣasya vajrapāṇimahādyuteḥ /  mañjughoṣasya te bhītāḥ kumārasyaiva mantrarāṭ /
tgt_original: 並皆歸依法王教及祕密主藥叉金剛手大威德。 及歸依曼殊室利童真真言三麼耶。

src_original: paritrāyasva bho bāla sarvasattvānukampaka /
tgt_original: 曼殊室利願垂哀愍救護。

src_original: nirdahiṣyāmi no adya krūrakamantraiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ /  krodhena mūrcchitā hyadya pratiṣṭhāma mahītale // Mmk_50.5 //
tgt_original: 我等被此忿怒真言燒爍。 我輩皆受楚苦悶絕擗地。

src_original: tatastāṃ bodhisattvā vai bālarūpī mahādyutiḥ /
tgt_original: 時大威德以曼殊室利童子形。

src_original: mā bhaiṣṭhatha surāḥ sarve yakṣarākṣasadānavā // Mmk_50.6 //  samayaṃ vo mayā hyuktaḥ alaṅghyaḥ sarvadevataiḥ /
tgt_original: 而作是言。 諸天等勿怖　　藥叉羅剎娑 及諸修羅眾　　我說三昧耶

src_original: mānuṣāmānuṣāścāpi sarvabhūtaistu kevalaiḥ // Mmk_50.7 //
tgt_original: 無能違越者　　人非人鬼神

src_original: maitracitta sadā bhūtvā tanmantraṃ smarate sadā /  sambuddhaṃ dvipadāmagryaṃ śākyasiṃhaṃ narottamam // Mmk_50.8 //
tgt_original: 咸念正等覺　　法王兩足尊 釋師子仁王　　彼佛說真言

src_original: tenaiva bhāṣitaṃ mantraṃ uṣṇīṣādyāḥ salocanāḥ /  trailokyaguravaścakī tejorāśiṃ jayodbhavam // Mmk_50.9 //
tgt_original: 佛頂佛眼等　　於三界中輪

src_original: vijayoṣṇīṣamantrādyāṃ padmapāṇiṃ salokitam /
tgt_original: 光聚勝高頂　　最勝頂真言 蓮華手觀音　　聖觀自在尊

src_original: avalokitanāthaṃ ca bhṛkuṭī tārāṃ yaśasvinīm // Mmk_50.10 //
tgt_original: 毘俱胝多羅　　名稱明妃尊

src_original: devīṃ ca sitavāsinyāṃ mahāśvetā yaśovatīm /
tgt_original: 白衣及大白　　野輪嚩底時

src_original: vidyāṃ bhogavatīṃ cāpi hayagrīvaśca mantrarāṭ // Mmk_50.11 //  ete hyabjakule mantrā pradhānā jinaniḥsṛtā /
tgt_original: 威德馬頭尊　　蓮華族明王

src_original: ekākṣaraścakravartī vā mantrāṇāmadhipatiṃ prabhum // Mmk_50.12 //
tgt_original: 最勝佛流出　　一字轉輪王

src_original: smṛtvā devadevaṃ ca mantranāthaṃ mahādyutim /
tgt_original: 真言中主宰　　應念天中天

src_original: krodhamaprabhavo tasya yamānto nāma nāmataḥ // Mmk_50.13 //
tgt_original: 明主大威猛　　大忿閻曼德

src_original: avalokitanāthasya cetāṃsi karuṇodayāḥ /
tgt_original: 亦念觀自在　　從心起悲愍

src_original: mahākaruṇākṛṣṭamanaso pūrvabuddhaiḥ prakāśitā // Mmk_50.14 //  sā tārā tārayate jantūṃ avalokitabhāṣitā /
tgt_original: 先佛故宣說　　多羅救有情 觀自在所說　　住悲三麼地

src_original: vidyā samādhijā āryā stryākhyā saṃjñārūpiṇī // Mmk_50.15 //
tgt_original: 聖者現女形　　是菩提薩埵

src_original: lokadhātusahasrāṇi asaṅkhyā bahudhā punaḥ // Mmk_50.16 //
tgt_original: 復於無數剎　　遊歷諸苦難

src_original: paryaṭanta tadā devī sattvānāṃ hitakāraṇā /  strīrūpadhāriṇī bhūtvā mantrarūpeṇa dehinām // Mmk_50.17 //
tgt_original: 拔濟諸有情　　持妙色女容

src_original: vidhineyatadāṃ sattvāṃ bodhiyāneti yojayet /
tgt_original: 調伏皆令順　　安立菩提乘

src_original: caryā bodhisattvānāṃ acinteyaṃ prakāśitā // Mmk_50.18 //  vajrapāṇiṃ tathā vīraṃ mantrāṇāmadhipatiṃ smaret /
tgt_original: 為諸菩薩說　　應念金剛手 勤勇真言王　　持族麼莫鷄

src_original: śaṅkulā mekhalāṃ caiva vajramuṣṭiṃ yaśasvinīm /  krodhendratilakaṃ śatruṃ nīladaṇḍaṃ sabhairavam // Mmk_50.20 //
tgt_original: 金剛拳名稱　　忿怒妙月黶

src_original: ete dūtigaṇāḥ krodhāḥ vidyādhyakṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
tgt_original: 青棒恐怖形　　如是使者眾 忿怒名天師　　金剛族最勝

src_original: pradhānāṃ vajrakule sarve asmadrakṣitā hi te // Mmk_50.21 //
tgt_original: 若念便加護　　世間中香象

src_original: gajagandhaṃ tathā loke bodhisattvaṃ maharddhikam /  mahāsthānagataṃ dhīmaṃ bodhisattvaṃ maharddhikam // Mmk_50.22 //
tgt_original: 菩薩大威德　　得大勢菩薩

src_original: jyeṣṭhaṃ tanayamukhyaṃ tu samantabhadraṃ suśobhanam /
tgt_original: 大威德長子　　普賢端嚴尊

src_original: yaḥ smaret tadā kāle bhayaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate // Mmk_50.23 //
tgt_original: 是時若憶念　　遠離諸恐怖

src_original: māṇibhadraṃ tathā nityaṃ jambhalaṃ yakṣamuttamam /  sarvaśrāvakapratyekaṃ buddhānāṃ ca kuto bhayam // Mmk_50.24 //
tgt_original: 最勝藥叉王　　聲聞緣覺眾 咸皆離諸怖　　若供養彼等

src_original: smaraṇāt pūjanāt teṣāṃ mahārakṣā prakīrttitā /  bṛhat phalaṃ tadā devāṃ puṇyābhāṃ ca asaṃjñakā // Mmk_50.25 //
tgt_original: 即得大加護　　廣果及福生

src_original: strīrūpadhāriṇāṃ devīṃ vītarāgāṃ maharddhikām /
tgt_original: 色無色諸天　　離欲大威德

src_original: ratnatraye ca pūjāṃ vai prasannā jinaśāsane // Mmk_50.26 //
tgt_original: 供養三寶者　　淨信於佛教

src_original: teṣāṃ na vidyate kiñcit mitrāmitrabhayaṃ yadā /
tgt_original: 彼皆無所有　　友非友怖畏

src_original: samayaṃ tatra ityuktaḥ alaṅghyaṃ sarvamantribhiḥ // Mmk_50.27 //
tgt_original: 則名三昧耶　　諸真言難越

src_original: etat krodhavare khyātaṃ yamāntasyaiva varṇite /
tgt_original: 此忿怒中勝　　閻曼德所說

src_original: samaye tasthire sarve jinaputrānubuddhinā // Mmk_50.29 //
tgt_original: 咸皆生歡喜　　各住於本誓 佛子皆稱讚　　聞此凌忽言

src_original: yakṣasenāpatiḥ kruddhaḥ vacanaṃ cet parābhavam /
tgt_original: 藥叉主忿怒　　於彼時振動

src_original: samprakampya tadā sarvāṃ lokadhātumasaṅkhyakām // Mmk_50.30 //  nirarthaṃ krodharājaṃ tu kimarthamidaṃ prakāśitam /
tgt_original: 無數千世界　　忿怒王無益 何故諸佛子　　而已先宣說

src_original: jinaputraistadā pūrvaṃ sattvānāṃ vinayakāraṇāt // Mmk_50.31 //  prabhāvaṃ krodharājasya udyaṣṭaṃ ca purātanam /
tgt_original: 忿怒王威德　　調伏暴有情 在於大眾中　　高聲而告令

src_original: evamuktāstato vajrī vajraṃ nikṣipyaṃ tasthure // Mmk_50.32 //
tgt_original: 金剛手言已　　棄擲金剛杵

src_original: tataḥ prahasya matimāṃ bālarūpī maharddhikaḥ /
tgt_original: 則彼大威德　　妙音智慧尊

src_original: kumāro mañjughoṣo vai imāṃ vācamudīrayet // Mmk_50.33 //
tgt_original: 童子形嗤誚　　復作如是言

src_original: mā praduṣya mahāyakṣa vajrapāṇi maharddhika /
tgt_original: 勿惡大藥叉　　金剛手威德

src_original: mayā prakāśito hyeṣa krodharājo maharddhikaḥ // Mmk_50.34 //
tgt_original: 我所說此聖　　怒王大自此

src_original: tavaiva mantraṃ dāsyāmi yathecchaṃ samprakāśaya /
tgt_original: 我今授與汝　　恣意而廣說

src_original: tvayā na śakyaṃ krodhasya prabhāvaṃ parikīrtitam // Mmk_50.35 //
tgt_original: 汝豈盡能述　　忿怒王威德

src_original: tayaiva saṃsthito hyeṣa dehastha iha dṛśyate /
tgt_original: 是汝所任持　　如在身中現

src_original: na śakyaṃ nivarttituṃ hyatra krodhāviṣṭo hi vai prabho /
tgt_original: 不能現變化　　忿怒阿尾奢

src_original: yathecchaṃ samprakāśayasva samayaṃ tyaktvānumanyataḥ // Mmk_50.37 //
tgt_original: 聽汝廣宣說　　除捨三摩耶

src_original: asnāte prasupte ca grāmyadharmānuvarttite /
tgt_original: 不澡浴耽眠　　隨順於愛慾

src_original: tailābhyakte arakṣe ca duṣṭacitteṣu vā sadā // Mmk_50.38 //
tgt_original: 塗油貪盥飾　　瞋怒心常恒

src_original: tyakto mantravaraiḥ sarvaiḥ aprasanneṣu śāsane /
tgt_original: 棄捨勝真言　　不淨信佛教

src_original: vaicikitso tathā martyo aśrāddheṣu duḥsthite // Mmk_50.39 //
tgt_original: 疑惑於正法　　惡行不淨信

src_original: (Vaidya 430)  saddharmaratnasaṅghe ca pratikṣeptavyāḥ samāhite /
tgt_original: 於妙法僧寶　　謗毀心散動

src_original: nagnake ca sadocchiṣṭe aśucyācāragocare // Mmk_50.40 //  agupte hyamantrayukte ca nityocchiṣṭe hi nirghṛṇe /
tgt_original: 穢污於三寶　　非清淨境界 不密真言教　　常穢無哀愍

src_original: devāvasathacaityeṣu vihārāṅgaṇamaṇḍale // Mmk_50.41 //
tgt_original: 天室寺道場　　於中穢污行

src_original: samayabhraṣṭā prasannāśca mantrayuktimajānakā // Mmk_50.42 //
tgt_original: 破三昧耶禁　　不知相應明

src_original: iṣiskhalitagatācārā teṣāṃ krodho nipātayet /
tgt_original: 乃至微虧行　　忿怒皆治罰

src_original: sarveṣāṃ mānuṣāṃ loke apramādo na vidyate // Mmk_50.43 //
tgt_original: 人間一切處　　不可免放逸

src_original: pramādamabhirāginyaḥ samayabhraṃśānucchidriṇe /  hanyante krodharājena aprayuktaistu mantribhiḥ // Mmk_50.44 //  sarvathā bāliśāḥ sarve pramādā vaśagāminaḥ /
tgt_original: 放逸心染著　　若毀三昧耶 忿怒王得便　　愚夫一切處
